entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a wizard who is confused about his relationship with Cho and Cedric.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A character in Harry's dream, accusing him of luring her to the D.A. room under false pretenses.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A character mentioned in the story, who gave Cho loads of Chocolate Frog cards.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is explaining something to him and making it seem more complicated.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A character in the story, who is snuffling in his sleep.

entities.name: divination
entities.description: A subject that Hermione's explanation is compared to.

entities.name: chocolate frog cards
entities.description: Cards that Cedric gave Cho and Harry promised her.

relationships.description: Cho accuses Harry of luring her to the D.A. room under false pretenses.
Harry compares himself to Cedric, who gave Cho loads of Chocolate Frog cards.
Hermione is explaining something to Harry and making it seem more complicated.
